localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
blogPost.body: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
blogPost.title: Google Fonts Icons - Google Fonts now supports icons
blogPost.author: David Haddad

localize.description: Google Fonts获得了新的标志，因为目录中增加了图标，从Material Icons开始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字体现在支持图标

localize.description: Google Fonts獲得了新的標誌，因爲目錄中增加了圖標，從Material Icons開始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字體現在支持圖標

previous.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
previous.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games

localize.description: 介绍一下Minis，允许用户在房间里直接添加游戏、投票或其他互动组件。迷你版增加了当前对话的内容，并提供了新的话题。第一批迷你版包括民意测验、你愿意吗和随机选择。
localize.tagline: 社交音讯变得更好了，有了小游戏。

localize.description: 介紹一下Minis，允許用戶在房間裏直接添加遊戲、投票或其他互動組件。迷你版增加了當前對話的內容，並提供了新的話題。第一批迷你版包括民意測驗、你願意嗎和隨機選擇。
localize.tagline: 社交音訊變得更好了，有了小遊戲。

next.excerpt: The joyful card platform ✨ Teamo has everything you need to create delightful group cards for any occasion with fun messages, photos, and loopy GIFs. Customizable, schedulable, and perfect for collaboration 💛 🎉
next.title: Teamo 2.0 - Designed for the group, built for the celebration

localize.description: 欢乐贺卡平台✨ Teamo拥有一切您需要的东西，为任何场合创建令人愉快的团体贺卡，并提供有趣的信息、照片和循环GIF。可定制，可安排，非常适合协作💛 🎉?
localize.tagline: 为集团设计，为庆典而建

localize.description: 歡樂賀卡平臺✨ Teamo擁有一切您需要的東西，爲任何場合創建令人愉快的團體賀卡，並提供有趣的信息、照片和循環GIF。可定製，可安排，非常適合協作💛 🎉?
localize.tagline: 爲集團設計，爲慶典而建
